miniapp.name: Mute
miniapp.subtitle: Log your quiet moments
miniapp.description: Mute is a tiny ambient mini app that lets you quickly log how loud your environment feels. Tap to mark quiet, medium, or loud and see your day fill with moments of calm or noise.
miniapp.ogDescription: Mute is a tiny ambient mini app that lets you quickly log how loud your environment feels. Tap to mark quiet, medium, or loud and see your day fill with moments of calm or noise.
